title: The City University of New York
sitename: The City University of New York
cleaned_text: Your Dream Starts Here Welcome to the Fall 2023 Semester! THE LATEST AT CUNY [Simply the Best](https://www1.cuny.edu/mu/forum/2023/08/16/five-cuny-colleges-recognized-among-nations-best-389-four-year-colleges-by-the-princeton-review/) Five CUNY schools are again named among "Best Colleges" by the Princeton Review, lauded for their outstanding overall quality and value ['CUNY Lifting New York'](https://www1.cuny.edu/mu/forum/2023/06/28/cuny-unveils-strategic-plan-to-strengthen-innovate-and-transform-nations-leading-engine-of-upward-mobility-by-2030/) University unveils plan to expand access, enhance student success and increase impact as an engine of upward social and civic mobility [Welcome Back!](https://www1.cuny.edu/mu/forum/2023/08/25/cuny-welcomes-students-to-new-academic-year/) CUNY opens a promising academic year with 250 newly appointed full-time faculty and a renewed commitment to student success DISTINGUISHED PROFESSORS [The Brightest In Their Fields](https://www.cuny.edu/alumni-students-faculty/faculty/distinguished-professors/) Becoming a Distinguished Professor is a major milestone. We're proud of the 145 ground-breaking researchers and trailblazing scholars who have earned this distinction as our most esteemed faculty. They are dedicated to pushing the boundaries of knowledge and inspiring the next generation of leaders. 175+ Online Degree Options [Redesigning What it Means to be Flexible](https://www.cuny.edu/academics/cuny-online/) When a university founded on access builds an online degree, it's designed around up-to-the-minute skills you need. It's built for your busy schedule. Explore our ever-growing options for online degrees at CUNY. OUR VOICES [Stepping Into](http://www.cuny.edu/cunyverse) the CUNYverse! the CUNYverse! Explore the many unique and varied perspectives of our University through the eyes, words, microphones and lenses of those who know it best. Introducing a bold new platform for expression of all things CUNY (and some not) that is by students, for students. Chancellor Matos Rodríguez [Meet our Chancellor](https://www.cuny.edu/about/chancellor/) A member of the CUNY community for two decades, Chancellor Matos Rodríguez is using his platform as the first educator of color and first Latino in the role to ensure that the University excels at our mission to serve and elevate New Yorkers of all backgrounds. Campus Events 9/11/2023 | 3:00 PM - 4:00 PM College of Staten Island 9/11/2023 | 6:00 PM [Samuel G. Freedman - Into the Bright Sunshine: Young Hubert Humphrey and the Fight for Civil Rights](https://events.cuny.edu/?post_type=cunyevent&p=44969) Hunter College 9/08/2023 — 9/11/2023 | 7:00 PM - 9:30 PM [Wadada Leo Smith: "America Transformed"](https://events.cuny.edu/?post_type=cunyevent&p=45040) Brooklyn College 9/12/2023 | 11:00 - 11:45 AM [Basic Training on Using "Navigate CSI" for Early Alerts and Feedback](https://events.cuny.edu/?post_type=cunyevent&p=44965) College of Staten Island Prestige Without the Price New York City is Your Campus The nation's largest urban university, offering a range of [undergraduate,](https://www.cuny.edu/admissions/undergraduate/) [graduate](https://www.cuny.edu/admissions/graduate-studies/) degrees and [continuing education](https://www.cuny.edu/academics/cpe/) opportunities to over 243,000 students of all ages and backgrounds on 25 NYC campuses. 25Colleges 25 NYC Campuses Apply to CUNY Today Every year, hundreds of thousands of students choose The City University of New York for a multitude of reasons that can be summed up as one: opportunity. Providing a quality, accessible education, regardless of background or means, has been CUNY's mission since 1847. 76% Graduate Debt-Free BestColleges for your Money 2.8K+ Programs CUNY is committed to maintaining a safe environment at all times and is a strong supporter of New York State's policies and laws against sexual assault on college campuses.
